description: OnePlus Pad Lite is reportedly in development and expected to launch soon in India. Leaked images reveal the design and a folio case for this affordable tablet, alongside key specifications. Read on to learn more about the tablet, which is expected to feature a MediaTek chipset and pack a 9,340mAh battery.
title: OnePlus Pad Lite Design and Key Specifications Leaked, Could Launch Soon

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 are expected to debut at the next Galaxy Unpacked event, likely in New York as per previous reports. Samsung is also likely to unveil the Galaxy Watch 8 and Watch 8 Classic alongside these phones, and new running events set up by the company in the city give us an idea of when to expect the next Galaxy Unpacked event.
title: Samsung's Upcoming Running Events Reportedly Hint at Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7 and Watch 8 Series Launch Timeline

description: Poco F7 design renders have been leaked, giving us a peek at the upcoming smartphone in a black colour option. Meanwhile, Poco has also revealed some of the key features of the upcoming smartphone via Flipkart, ahead of its debut in India later this month.
title: Poco F7 Design Spotted in Leaked Renders; Battery Specifications Revealed via Flipkart

description: Neuralink's "Blindsight" brain implant is said to have enabled a monkey to perceive non-existent objects, a step toward aiding the blind. Engineer Joseph O'Doherty stated the device stimulated visual brain areas, prompting eye movements towards "visualised" targets two-thirds of the time. Neuralink's first public data on Blindsight, a chip mimicking eye function, suggests it could treat intractable conditions in the future.
title: Neuralink Device Helps Monkey See Something That’s Not There

description: Apple's Mac Mini with M4 chip is now available at a discounted price in India, when purchased with eligible credit card purchases. This promotion slashes nearly Rs. 10,000 off its launch price. The latest compact desktop features Apple's newest Silicon processor and along with 16GB of RAM, a significant improvement over the M2 model that arrived in 2023.
title: Apple's Mac Mini With M4 Chip Price in India Drops to Rs. 49,999 With Discounts on Amazon
Power Meets Affordability: Flipkart’s Best Gaming Laptop Deals for June 2025

description: Samsung Galaxy F36 has been listed on the Google Play Console, along with the anticipated design and hardware specifications of the handset. The Samsung Galaxy F36 is also on the Google Play Console Supported Devices list alongside the Galaxy M36. Samsung has begun teasing the launch of the Galaxy M36 via Amazon, ahead of its upcoming launch in India.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36, Galaxy F36 Spotted on Google Play Console; Galaxy M36 Launch Reportedly Teased via Amazon

description: Google plans to sever ties with AI data-labeling startup Scale AI after rival Meta acquired a 49% stake. Reuters' sources reveal Google, Scale's largest customer, had projected $200 million in payments this year for crucial human-labeled training data, vital for developing models like Gemini. The search giant is reportedly already in discussions with Scale AI's competitors to shift this significant workload, signaling a major disruption in their long-standing partnership.
title: Google, Scale AI's Largest Customer, Said to Plan Split After Meta Deal
